name: Choose Your Own Dickens: A Christmas Carol
name_original: Choose Your Own Dickens: A Christmas Carol
description:
Choose Your Own Dickens: A Christmas Carol is a fun spin on the classic novella. Eighteen different endings are possible!

The design is original, as is most of the writing. Brief excerpts and paraphrases from Dickens are in italics, and cropped versions of John Leech's original illustrations are included.
